body.name: AKARSOLY Retro Game Console,Classic Mini Handheld Vidoe Game Console Built-in 620 Classic Edition Games,AV Output and Dual Game Controllers.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 20 hrs 21 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 17 hrs 21 mins
features: 🎮【Classic Game Console】：The Retro Game Console is very popular in 1980s-1990s which includes 620 built-in classic video games, bringing you back to Childhood Memories instantly. Games includes many types, such as action, puzzles, sports, fighting and racing. These games are challenging, engaging and fun.You may not be used to it, but it's still so exciting and challenging to play. The most cost-effective alternative to mini classic game system.

🎮【PLUG AND PLAY】：This console has an AV output. Make sure your TV/monitor has AV input connectors. Simply connect the game console to the power supply with the charger, then connect it to the TV using an AV cable and connect the controllers. Turn on, start playing now. Tips: it does not go back to the menu when you press “select + start” together. So you have to press RESET on the machine every time you want to switch a game.

🎮【Best family Activity for Kids]】：Classic Mini Retro Game Console gives your children the chance to experience your growth and happiness, and promote the communication and feelings with your children. Let children enjoy the same happiness and fun in their childhood as you did! The nes retro games can also practice children's logical thinking and bring them confidence in game success.

🎮【IMPORTANT NOTICE】： It's a third-party product, not original Retro game Console.There are some game repetitions in this mini console,For those who are new to the classic game console. This is an 8-bit game console with simple controls and picture quality will not be as crisp as today's games,and frozen sometimes, you may not get used to the retro game console. But many classic games are still fun and very challenging.

🎮【OUR GUARANTEE】：This game console cannot save progress, and some games are in Japanese. We provide 30 days no reason to replace a faulty product or refund. If you have any question about our product, please feel free to contact us and let us know about the issue and we will reply in 24 hours.
body.description: Retro Game Console with support AV OutputThis is a third-party game console product.Game type:1.Classic action games.2.Classic shooting games.3.Classic sports games.4.Classic fighting games.5.Classic racing games.6.Classic puzzle games.Specification:1.Color - Grey2.Material - Plastic and metal3.Joystick Type - Wired4.Joystick line length - 58 inch5.Output - AV6.Applicable platform - TV7.Plug - Original US plug8.Game Console Size - 5.12*3.94*1.77 inchPackage Includes:1 * Retro Game Console2 * Game Controller1 * AV Cable1 * Manual & Game List1 * US electric power plugImportant Notice:1.Mini Console supports AV TV, If you TV has only HDMI, Please use an av to hdmi adapter to connect.2.Not suitable for children under 3 years old to use alone. Single-player mode only uses the main port.3.This machine can only use voltage converters that comply with national standards.Do not play when abnormalities occur.4.When cleaning the machine,please disconnect the machine power.at the same time,regularly check whether the wires,plugs,shells and other parts are in good condition.
